${ModID}:Strike.NAME: 打擊
${ModID}:Strike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害。 NL 獲得 !${ModID}:a! 點 ${ModID}:狂氣 。

${ModID}:Defend.NAME: 防禦
${ModID}:Defend.DESCRIPTION: 獲得 !B! 點 格擋 。 NL 獲得 !${ModID}:a! 點 ${ModID}:狂氣 。

${ModID}:AssaultThesis.NAME: 攻勢推演
${ModID}:AssaultThesis.DESCRIPTION: 使所有敵人 ${ModID}:臨時 降低 !M! 點 力量 。抽 !${ModID}:m2! 張牌。抽到的牌每有 1 點 [E] 消耗，獲得 35 點 ${ModID}:銀鑰能量 。

${ModID}:QueensSword.NAME: 女王之劍
${ModID}:QueensSword.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 點傷害 !M! 次，每次造成傷害後獲得 1 點 ${ModID}:臨時 力量 。打出後使 「女王之劍」 傷害次數 + 1 ，最多提高為 6 次。 ${ModID}:餘波 ：獲得和打出相等的 ${ModID}:銀鑰能量 。

${ModID}:FirstDoctrine.NAME: 第一哲學
${ModID}:FirstDoctrine.DESCRIPTION: 打出卡牌後，獲得 !M! 點 [E] ，每回合最多觸發 !${ModID}:m2! 次。

${ModID}:RewindingTime.NAME: 溯洄時計
${ModID}:RewindingTime.DESCRIPTION: 打出 ${ModID}:指令卡 後，將其從棄牌堆重新加入手牌，該效果單回合最多生效 !M! 次。

${ModID}:HandOfOblivion.NAME: 遺忘之手
${ModID}:HandOfOblivion.DESCRIPTION: 將 1 張 打擊 加入手中，「 打擊 」的基礎傷害增加 !M! %。

${ModID}:Insight.NAME: 靈感
${ModID}:Insight.DESCRIPTION: 獲得 [E] ，抽 !${ModID}:m2! 張牌。 NL 消耗
${ModID}:Insight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 獲得 [E] [E] ，抽 !${ModID}:m2! 張牌。 NL 消耗

${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage X{!M!|>0=+!M!} times. NL Gain X{!M!|>0=+!M!} Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Shuffle *Smite{!Upgrades!|>0=+} and *Safety{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
